src:
4 Bomber Asing yang Tampil Tajam di Shopee Liga 1 2019
06 Nov 2019, 12:04 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persaingan di Shopee Liga 1 2019 menjadi semakin menarik dengan kehadiran bomber-bomber asing. Mereka mampu unjuk kehebatan di kompetisi kasta tertinggi di tanah air itu.
Kecenderungan tim Liga 1 2019 mengandalkan striker atau penyerang asing sudah menjadi tradisi sejak dulu. Demi bisa bersaing di kasta tertinggi sepak bola Indonesia, klub besar hingga medioker tak ragu untuk membawa penyerang asing sebagai bintang yang akan membantu tim membobol gawang lawan.
Hal ini terbukti dengan dominasi pemain asing di papan atas daftar pencetak gol sementara Liga 1 2019. Empat posisi teratas menjadi milik pemain asing, hingga peringkat kelima dan keenam menjadi milik pemain Indonesia.
Namun, itu pun pemain naturalisasi, di mana Alberto Goncalves dan Ilija Spasojevic yang berada di posisi tersebut dengan torehan 13 gol. Jika melihat daftar sementara, hanya Titus Bonai, pemain lokal Indonesia, yang menembus 10 besar daftar pencetak gol, dengan torehan 12 gol.
Dilansir Bola.com, ada empat pemain asing yang layak diberikan predikat predator di Shopee Liga 1 2019 karena ketajaman mereka dalam mengemas gol untuk tim masing-masing.
text:
4 Sharp-looking Foreign Bomber in Shopee Liga 1 2019
Nov 6, 2019, 12:04 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Competition in Shopee Liga 1 2019 is becoming increasingly attractive with the presence of foreign bombers. They were able to show greatness in the highest caste competition in the country.
The tendency of the 2019 League 1 team to rely on foreign strikers or strikers has been a tradition long ago. In order to be able to compete in the highest caste of Indonesian soccer, big clubs and mediocre players do not hesitate to bring in foreign attackers as stars who will help the team break into the opposing goal.
This is proven by the dominance of foreign players at the top of the list of temporary scorers in Liga 1 2019. The top four positions belong to foreign players, up to fifth and sixth place belong to Indonesian players.
However, it was also a naturalized player, where Alberto Goncalves and Ilija Spasojevic were in that position with 13 goals scored. If you look at the provisional list, only Titus Bonai, a local Indonesian player, penetrated the top 10 goalscorers list, with a notch 12 goals.
Reported by Bola.com, there are four foreign players who deserve to be awarded the predator predicate in Shopee Liga 1 2019 because of their sharpness in packaging goals for their respective teams.
